name: Shining Online
description:
Shining Online is a shining-style game developed by Newts and Ty. It is currently at version 0.4, which was released back in 2003. Work on the project ceased during university / life, but is now back on track. As usual, release dates are not being published, but keep up with the Worklog to see what we’re doing…

You can also get smaller, more regular updates on the project Twitter page: twitter.com/shiningonline
